AppFooter.tagline: Connecting the entire agricultural supply chain, from seed to table.

agentToolsPage.title: Agent Tools
agentToolsPage.description: Securely look up user information for verification and support.
agentToolsPage.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have the required permissions to access this page.
agentToolsPage.resultsPlaceholder: Enter a phone number to look up a user.

hero.title: Empowering Agriculture from Seed to Sale, with {appName}
hero.subtitle: The comprehensive platform connecting every stakeholder in the agricultural supply chain for a more sustainable and prosperous future.

features.title: A Fully Integrated Ecosystem
features.subtitle: DamDoh provides the tools you need to connect, trade, and grow your agricultural business.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: Connect with farmers, buyers, experts, and suppliers using our AI-powered suggestion engine.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell produce, inputs, and equipment with trust and transparency through traceable listings.

forums.title: Knowledge Sharing
forums.description: Join community forums to discuss best practices, solve challenges, and share your expertise.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer your skills or find expert help for custom harvesting, drone surveying, and other services.

forWho.badge: For Everyone in the Supply Chain
forWho.title: A Platform Built for You
forWho.description: Whether you're tending the fields or sourcing for a global market, DamDoh is designed to meet your specific needs.

farmers.title: For Farmers & Cooperatives
farmers.description: Access new markets, get fair prices, and learn sustainable practices to increase your yield and profitability.

buyers.title: For Buyers & Exporters
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable produce directly from producers and manage your supply chain with confidence.

experts.title: For Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise, find new clients, and contribute to a more efficient agricultural ecosystem.

forWho.imageAlt: A diverse group of agricultural professionals collaborating.

cta.title: Join the DamDoh Community Today
cta.subtitle: Sign up now and become part of the future of agriculture. It's free to get started.
